text: Matthew Clark (born November 25, 1936) is an American actor and director. Clark has played many character roles in Westerns, comedies, and dramas.Matt Clark Biography (1936-) He was born in Washington, D.C.. His best known role is as Chester the Bartender in the 1990 movie Back to the Future Part III. He also played Uncle Henry in Return to Oz (1985). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American stage actors Category:American television producers Category:American movie directors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Washington, D.C.
title: Matt Clark
